data.name: Sakura Day 2 Mahjong
data.detailed_description:
It’s time to set off on an unforgettable adventure around mysterious Asia! Get acquainted with the culture of the East: walk through a flowering sakura garden, climb up snowy peaks, visit a great temple and dive into a magical lake!

Here you will find the most varied Mahjong levels ever to suit any taste: from simple and classical to elegant Eastern-themed levels. Fast blitz levels to pass a spare minute, multi-tiered levels and huge levels of 200 tiles! What else do you need for a relaxing evening? And the most dedicated Mahjong fans can get amazing trophies and rewards!

Enjoy over 8 hours of adventure, 6 varied locations and 120 unique levels! Get ready to see the most wonderful places of mysterious Asia! A wonderful journey with new Mahjong levels awaits you! Dive into the magic of the East with Sakura Day 2 Mahjong!

- collect golden tiles to complete levels
- remove bonus tiles and get additional coins and bonuses
- remove tiles faster to increase your combo multiplier and earn more coins
- 6 locations, 120 levels and multiple difficulty modes
- a magical East Asian atmosphere
- colorful premium-quality graphics
- original themed tiles and 3 styles of tile suit
- beautiful music which doesn't distract you from playing

data.short_description: Mysterious Asia awaits you! Over 8 hours of the game and 120 Mahjong levels to suit any taste.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11.6
  • Processor: CPU: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
